thread.title: BREAKING: Nuclear power plant in English channel EXPLODES leaving several injured
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Nuclear power plant in English channel EXPLODES leaving several injured

title: BREAKING: Nuclear power plant in English channel EXPLODES leaving several injured
text:
BREAKING: Nuclear power plant in English channel EXPLODES leaving several injured BREAKING: Nuclear power plant in English channel EXPLODES leaving several injured A HUGE explosion has taken place in a nuclear power plant in the English Channel injuring several workers. PUBLISHED: 10:22, Thu, Feb 9, 2017 | UPDATED: 10:29, Thu, Feb 9, 2017 
The blast occurred at around 10am in the engine room of the Flamanville plant on the French side of the English channel. 
According to the firemen, an explosion and a fire were reported in the heart of the plant - outside the nuclear zone. 
There are believed to be several injuries, although it is yet to be confirmed how many and to what extent people have been affected by the blast. 
It was also unclear whether there was any damage to the building itself, but police have confirmed "there is no radiological risk". 
This is a breaking news story. Please refresh your page for the latest updates. 
More to follow..
